Deficiency Narrative: The requqired  statement that the majority of the voting members of the governing body must consist of persons who do not have a conflict of interest that would potentially interfere with objective decision making was missing in the policies.
Correction Narrative: The operation submitted updated conflict of interest policies regarding the governing body.

Deficiency Narrative: The required statement of employee may not delegate the responsibility to make a report wasn't included in the policies.
The required information wasn't included in the operation's policies.
Correction Narrative: The operation submitted updated policies regarding complaint filings.

Deficiency Narrative: The operation was missing the components in the policy--(2)-(5).
Correction Narrative: The operation submitted updated discipline policies to reflect the addition of the missing components.

Deficiency Narrative: The policy does not state the program rules and expectations that apply to the children.
The policy is missing the preservice training requirements for caregivers as well as EBI components
Correction Narrative: The operation submitted updated training requirements pertaining to EBI components.

Deficiency Narrative: The policies reflected  that the operation  will not accept emergency placements which needs to be corrected, the operation will be accepting emergency placements, but the operation isn't an emergency shelter.
Correction Narrative: The operation submitted updated admission policies that specify that the operation accepts emergency admissions, but is not to provide emergency care services.

Deficiency Narrative: The operation policies is missing Medical contraindications and religious beliefs.
Correction Narrative: Operation submitted via email their updated vaccine policy reflecting the added medical contraindications and religious beliefs.

Deficiency Narrative: The operation's policies has conflicting information regarding the use of restraints as well as missing information on the specific description of the interventions that are permitted.
Correction Narrative: Operation provided an updated policy with the types and techniques permitted for caregivers to use.

Deficiency Narrative: The outside fence is in need of repair with protruding nails.
Correction Narrative: The exterior fence is now in good repair and is no longer hazardous.

Deficiency Narrative: The required components were missing regarding orientation with a child in regards to EBI requirements. Missing (A)(i)-(ix)
Correction Narrative: The operation submitted updated policies regarding orientation in relation to EBI.

Deficiency Narrative: The operation's policies are missing the required components of standards 2-5.
Correction Narrative: The operation submitted updated policies regarding preventing, recognizing, and responding to abuse and neglect of children. Their updated policies include all components of the standard.

Deficiency Narrative: The operation's policy reflected they will be accepting girls, however the operation will be licensed to care for boys only, which wasn't correct on the operation's policies.
Correction Narrative: The operation submitted updated policies that reflect the appropriate gender that the operation wishes to serve.

Deficiency Narrative: The operation's policy does not address screening and selection procedures.
